mapper.select: SELECT category.CATEGORY_ID, category.CATEGORYNAME, COUNT(jobs.CATEGORY_ID) AS jobsCount FROM TV_DATA.CATEGORIES category, TV_DATA.JOBS jobs WHERE category.STATUS = 1 AND category.CATEGORY_ID = jobs.CATEGORY_ID GROUP BY category.CATEGORY_ID

SELECT jobs.JOB_ID, jobs.JOB_TITLE, jobs.REFERAL_AMOUNT, jobs.INTRO_AMOUNT, employerDtls.COMPANY_NAME, location.CITYNAME FROM TV_DATA.JOBS jobs, TV_DATA.EMPLOYER employer, TV_DATA.EMPLOYERDETAILS employerDtls, TV_DATA.LOCATION location WHERE jobs.STATUS = 1 AND employer.EMPLOYER_ID = jobs.EMPLOYER_ID AND employerDtls.EMPLOYER_ID = employer.EMPLOYER_ID AND jobs.LOCATION_ID = location.LOCATION_ID

SELECT jobs.JOB_ID, jobs.JOB_TITLE, jobs.REFERAL_AMOUNT, jobs.INTRO_AMOUNT, employerDtls.COMPANY_NAME, location.CITYNAME FROM TV_DATA.JOBS jobs, TV_DATA.EMPLOYER employer, TV_DATA.EMPLOYERDETAILS employerDtls, TV_DATA.LOCATION location WHERE jobs.STATUS = 1 AND employer.EMPLOYER_ID = jobs.EMPLOYER_ID AND employerDtls.EMPLOYER_ID = employer.EMPLOYER_ID AND jobs.LOCATION_ID = location.LOCATION_ID AND (jobs.INTRO_AMOUNT IS NOT NULL AND jobs.INTRO_AMOUNT != 0.00) ORDER BY jobs.INTRO_AMOUNT desc

SELECT jobs.JOB_ID, jobs.JOB_TITLE, jobs.REFERAL_AMOUNT, jobs.INTRO_AMOUNT, employerDtls.COMPANY_NAME, location.CITYNAME FROM TV_DATA.JOBS jobs, TV_DATA.EMPLOYER employer, TV_DATA.EMPLOYERDETAILS employerDtls, TV_DATA.LOCATION location WHERE jobs.STATUS = 1 AND employer.EMPLOYER_ID = jobs.EMPLOYER_ID AND employerDtls.EMPLOYER_ID = employer.EMPLOYER_ID AND jobs.LOCATION_ID = location.LOCATION_ID AND (jobs.EXPERIENCEREQUIRED = 0.00) ORDER BY jobs.INTRO_AMOUNT desc

SELECT jobs.JOB_TITLE, empDtls.COMPANY_NAME, jobs.SALARY, jobs.EXPERIENCEREQUIRED, location.CITYNAME, jobs.SKILLSREQUIRED, jobs.LONGDESC, employer.EMP_DISPLAYNAME, jobs.CREATED_DATE FROM TV_DATA.JOBS jobs, TV_DATA.EMPLOYER employer, TV_DATA.EMPLOYERDETAILS empDtls, TV_DATA.LOCATION location WHERE 1=1 AND
LOWER(jobs.JOB_TITLE) LIKE '%${jobTitle}%' AND
LOWER(location.CITYNAME) LIKE '%${location}%' AND
LOWER(jobs.salary) LIKE '%${salary}%' AND
LOWER(jobs.EXPERIENCEREQUIRED) LIKE '%${experience}%' AND
jobs.EMPLOYER_ID = employer.EMPLOYER_ID AND employer.EMPLOYER_ID = empDtls.EMPLOYER_ID AND location.LOCATION_ID = jobs.LOCATION_ID
